author: Ohene B. Apea

resources.description: In this study attempt was made to produce useful items from disposed polystyrene by modification with heat. Heat-modified polystyrene obtained by cooling the polymer melt at 285K, 303 K, 313K, 353K, 373K and 423K, were subjected to analysis to determine their ability to transfer some of their organic composition into saliva and sweat. The extents of material transfer and kinetics of the transfer process were determined. The research revealed that polystyrene waste can be recycled by heat application into useful products. And the products can transfer some of its material (organic) composition into saliva and sweat at 37 oC. It was observed that more materials are transferred into saliva than in sweat, and at equilibrium, the difference in the amount of materials transferred is 13.16%. Bio-dissolved compounds from the heat-modified polystyrene in the body fluids increased with increase in cooling temperature. In addition, the transfer of materials from the heat-modified polymer into saliva or sweat follows pseudo second order kinetic model at 37 oC, and the initial transfer rate was noted to be higher for saliva (1.916x10-6 mgC/g.min) than in sweat (1.654x10-6 mgC/g.min). But the rate constants and equilibrium concentrations were, 4.105min-1 and 6.832x10-4 mgC/g, as well as 4.761min-1 and 5.894x10-4 mgC/g for saliva and sweat respectively. More than 25% of all transferrable materials from the recycled polystyrene is transferred in to the body fluids in 30 minutes.
resources.name: KINETICS AND COOLING TEMPERATURE EFFECT OF THE TRANSFER OF SOLUBLE ORGANIC COMPOUNDS FROM HEAT-MODIFIED POLYSTYRENE INTO SALIVA AND SWEAT

organization.description:
Novel Publications is a service provided  in association with academicians and scholars from diverse fields to promote innovative ideas geared toward promoting human life through research and publications. 
It seeks to achieve this through:
1- Academic open access peer-reviewed e-journal publications.
2- Organizing, managing, and publishing e-conference proceedings.
3- Publication of e-books.
organization.title: Novel Publications
organization.name: novel-publications

name: journal-of-scientific-innovations-for-development-vol-2-no-1
notes: The journal is an international medium for publication of original scientific research in academic disciplines with emphasis on innovative ideas geared toward advancement in technology. It seeks to bring to light the cutting-edge scientific innovation and discoveries in the millennia with a view to shaping and improving human life. It is a multidisciplinary journal which accepts papers from natural sciences, engineering and other applied sciences. The scope is multidisciplinary and international.
title: JOURNAL OF SCIENTIFIC INNOVATIONS FOR DEVELOPMENT (Vol 2 No 1)
